channel.title: Npc follow
channel.description:
hey there,
i got a question about npc follow,
Base: ALLSTAR
when i teleport to my boss, it attack me, but if i like click around (x,y) eevry time whole time, my boss dont move and dont attack. and other players can kill him than without getting attacked
how can i fix this??
thanks you
